message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm a bit of a savvy shopper, and I've done my research on this product. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. What do you think, Alice?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to go up to $95, but no more than that. I'm trying to stay within my budget. What do you think?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $102. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to considering other buyers. What do you think?

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $100. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $100?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I've already gone as low as I can. I'm not willing to meet you at $100. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $105. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other buyers.

I understand that you've made concessions, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $105. I'm willing to meet you at $99. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price. Can you meet me at $99?

I'm not willing to go as low as $99, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to give up more. I'm willing to meet you at $101. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other buyers.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $101. I'm willing to meet you at $98. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
